definitions.definition: Thin , generally in a negative sense (as opposed to slim , which is thin in a positive sense).
examples: Her recent weight loss has made her look rather skinny than slender

definitions.definition: Naked ; nude (chiefly used in the phrase skinny dipping ).
Synonym of thin ( “ type of shot where the ball is struck by the bottom part of the club head ” ) .

main_definition: ( informal ) Thin , generally in a negative sense (as opposed to slim , which is thin in a positive sense).
secondary_definitions: ( informal , of food or beverages ) Having reduced fat or calories .
Naked ; nude (chiefly used in the phrase skinny dipping ).
( golf ) Synonym of thin ( “ type of shot where the ball is struck by the bottom part of the club head ” ) .
